title: 1 Bedroom Bright open window view of Lake Merritt AVL 09/01 ~ F303
posting_body: ['Spacious Remodel with Gorgeous Views of Lake Merritt', 'Property Address', '1524 1st Avenue | Apt 303 | Oakland, CA 94606', 'Available:', '09/01/2022', 'Sign up for a tour here !!:', '<URL>', '***Copy and paste link in search bar***', 'Offered By: Kasa Properties', 'First & 16 LP', 'Description', '*** Photos of similar apartment***', '* $2,795 lease written price, $200/month concession sent via check each month for the duration of the initial lease*', 'An intimate 16-unit building directly across the street from Lakeshore Park.', 'Every apartment has sweeping balcony views of Lake Merritt and downtown Oakland.', 'Ten minute walk to Lake Merritt BART.', 'Security features include keypad entry, controlled elevator access, video surveillance, and on-site building manager.', 'Select apartments feature new hardwood and tile floors, granite countertops, upgraded appliances and gas range.', 'One- and two-bedroom units.', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Parking: Garage (See Details Below)', 'Lease Duration: Flexible', 'Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)', 'Laundry: Shared, Coin Operated', 'Floor: 3rd', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Range / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Cable-ready', 'Intercom system', 'Hardwood floor', 'Tile floor', 'Granite countertop', 'BUILDING FEATURES', 'Elevator', 'Controlled access', 'On-street parking', 'Garage -- Attached', 'LEASE TERMS', 'Pet: $75-100 added to the base month per pet', 'Water and garbage & parking additional monthly costs.', 'Smoking is not permitted on the premises.', '*photos and video of similar unit*', 'Contact info:', 'show contact info', 'Professionally Managed by:', 'Kasa Operations LLC', "NOTE: The City of Berkeley's Fair Chance Housing Ordinance requires that rental housing providers display this notice to applicants -
